author: LGR
description:
Unboxing and testing even more weird old mouse devices on a Windows 98 PC! Checking out a Y2K "frutiger aero" Aqua Mouse, an Oberhofer solid cherry hand carved wooden wireless mouse, and a uh... Chrysler PT Cruiser from 2001 with tires on it. Yep.

● LGR things elsewhere:
Patreon https://www.patreon.com/LazyGameReviews
Bsky https://bsky.app/profile/lgr-yt.bsky.social

● Background music licensed from Epidemic Sound:
https://www.epidemicsound.com

00:00 A trio of weird old mice
00:47 Oberhofer Classic Mouse 1201
09:56 NKOK Chrysler PT Cruiser
20:37 Liquid Star Aqua Mouse

#LGR #Retro #computer
title: Weird Old Computer Mice: Wood, Water, & Wheels
